Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: I have an iPhone 4S with AT&T;, but for my vacation to Europe, needed an unlocked phone to avoid the expensive roaming charge. I am very happy with phone, it's easy to make calls, text, take pictures. The battery can last for a long period and no need to recharge frequently. No frills, nice screen and very light.

Reviews.Title: works perfectly in Mexico
Reviews.Author: karen M.
Reviews.Content: Got this phone for my business travel to Mexico one month ago,  everything works perfectly and meet all my needs, spent money buying this phone is much cheaper than the International roaming fees.  Call quality is great in both countries, battery life can last about one week. Highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: RCA T1
Reviews.Author: david "Got Jesus?"
Reviews.Content: For the price you can not beat it.  It does not vibrate.  Some of the menus are awkward...  but the bars are three times stronger than my LG

Reviews.Title: Not Bad
Reviews.Author: Samuel
Reviews.Content: I can't say enough good things about rcamobile. I was nervous about ordering a phone online.  Let me put your mind at ease these guys are very good at what they do. Phone said 3 stars, I figured there would be some minor problems, I could not find a scratch or blemish on it, and works perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: just interested "just interested"
Reviews.Content: Bought two of these phones, one for each of my kids.  They are really good little phones.  My son even submerged his in water, and when he dried it out, it worked fine!

Reviews.Title: **UPDATED** Decent basic phone, great price, fast shipping, but BEWARE!
Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: **UPDATE 12/18/13** The screen is unreadable.  After using the phone minimally for two months, my son came home very upset about a black bar covering the left 1/8 of the screen. A couple days later, after being reminded to take extra care with the phone (that he rarely uses and keeps in his bookbag during school or on his desk at home), the screen showed further damage and is virtually unreadable. Though he's a responsible kid and says he didn't misuse, drop or spill anything on the phone, I can't verify the screen damage wasn't due to user abuse. The screen's vulnerability is still worth noting. The phone and features still work (as far as we can tell), but without the ability to view the screen, it's now really only good for incoming calls. My original review follows.**Bought for our son for emergency contact and basic communications. It sends and receives texts and calls without issue. Haven't used the dual-sim feature, Bluetooth, or any data/browsing features. The micro-SD card slot doesn't hold the card in place, so if the back of the phone and battery is removed, it falls out. Photos are poor quality, as is expected with this model. The customizable profile features are helpful, so he can set his phone to silent during school, vibrate at church, and normal at home. As a parent, I really like the auto ON/OFF feature that we set to turn off at 9:30pm, then back on at 6:30am. He loves the radio feature. We are very happy with the reliability of this phone for basic use by a first time cell owner. Purchased for $31 through rcamobile with standard shipping and was received on time.

Reviews.Title: Great value for money spent
Reviews.Author: J.Stanley
Reviews.Content: This was the fanciest phone that would support my $10 web2go data plan. I’ve used it for about a month now and extremely pleased. The battery on the other hand is awesome. I can go thru a full day and a half before needing to charge it. It doesn't feel cheap which is great.

Reviews.Title: Very basic
Reviews.Author: Diane K. Brown
Reviews.Content: Volume hard to adjust.  Texting not easy to accomplish--too many steps and some of the qwerty keys seem glitchy.  Will probably be looking for another phone soon.

Reviews.Title: Difficult to figure out
Reviews.Author: Annoyed
Reviews.Content: I have had a dual sim phone before that was very easy to use. this one is not, when you make a call or send a text it does not ask you which sim you want to use, it chooses it for you and it more than likely is incorrect.small keys, poor manual guide that does not have any answers, and i would not recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Quad unlocked GSM phone!
Reviews.Author: Paul Magd
Reviews.Content: I used these when I went to the Philippines and now I am currently using it in the US! Truly an international phone, This was my third order. My wife loves it.

Reviews.Title: Small
Reviews.Author: Ga Hin
Reviews.Content: I am backing up from the smart phone world and it works great for talking and text. I like that the radio don't need the earphones in to work, but the volume cannot be lowered. My cell carrier sucks so I planned to go with another and need an unlocked phone for it.

Reviews.Title: Phone didn't work
Reviews.Author: Kathy Link
Reviews.Content: Ordering and shipping of phone was quick and efficient. Unfortunately, after giving the battery a thorough charge the phone wouldn't turn on. I took it to a battery place to see if they could check if the battery was actually charged. The answer was no. The charger seemed to be working, but the battery was defective. Overall the phone seemed more like a little plastic toy, than an electronic device. Amazon handled the return and refund quickly and efficiently.

Reviews.Title: Old school phone
Reviews.Author: Melanie Robles
Reviews.Content: This product is set with alot of old features like the minute minder that I couldn't figure out how to turn off.  Also no book to look up how to do anything, only an online version.  I found this experience very frustrating, also the sound for calls is not so good.  I will be sending this one back and I will be using the LG Prime that I also purchased.

Reviews.Title: Don't!
Reviews.Author: SawShave
Reviews.Content: Thought I could flog this off on a family member as a replacement, should not have bothered.  Cumbersome to use, incomprehensible instructions, quickly set aside it was.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't work for Simple Mobile Cell Phone Company
Reviews.Author: Heisel Ballester
Reviews.Content: It's supost to be an unlocked cell phone and I bougth it for use it in the Simple Mobile Company and doesn't work and I don't know why because this company is like T- Mobile

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Rebe
Reviews.Content: good phone if you want a simple and cheap phone this is good for you very good quality and good camera . nice seller

Reviews.Title: Temporary Replacement
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Although this phone is a good price, there are many things that are not impressive. First, the size. This phone is small and you can easily mis-type or fail to double tap a letter. The quickstart guide is fairly uninformative and the user manual that you download from the website is not that great either. My biggest concern is the 50 TOTAL messages that it will store on the phone coupled with the 30 that your SIM card will hold. I somehow managed to turn on the flashlight without having the phone on. However, this phone does perform the basic functions it says it will.

Reviews.Title: These are intended more for the multi phone line/service provider
Reviews.Author: Krystalla27
Reviews.Content: There's would have been great had i had more use for a 2 service provider kinda thing. But unfortunately they were going to be used by teenagers and well  we onky have one phone service provider.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY ITS TRASH
Reviews.Author: Swooop
Reviews.Content: STAY AWAY THIS PHONE IS TRASH I JUST GOT IT CALL QUALITY SUCKS BUTTONS ARE SO SMALL AND THE PHONE ITS SELF IS WAY SMALL IF I COULD RATE THIS A 0 I WOULD

Reviews.Title: Cheap
Reviews.Author: Jesse M. "-"
Reviews.Content: Lost my last phone and was looking for a cheap substitute until my contract with my provider was up. Bought this phone for a fairly reasonable price but the quality is disappointing. Simple things like adjusting call volume are overly complicated.  When using the headphones, the speaker on the phone does not turn off.  When typing a text, if it is idle and screen light goes off, text is erased and not saved to a draft.  Keyboard doesn't always seem to work, sometimes pushing directional keypad left will go right and vice versa.  Company told me mine might be defective and offered to send me out a new one free of charge but never did. If you're looking for a cheap phone, you can find nicer ones on ebay for lower prices. I gave two stars because it hasn't dropped calls and the battery life is pretty decent.

Reviews.Title: worst phone ever!
Reviews.Author: Tracey Serino
Reviews.Content: This phone is worse than a toy phone.  It didn't work, never took a charge and did not come with a sim card.Also, I have yet to receive my money back from it.  I sent it back and await reimbursement.

Reviews.Title: Won't turn on.
Reviews.Author: don
Reviews.Content: Won't turn on after inserting battery so I plug in charger.  Been 2 hours now and nothing. And no manual just a flyer that doesn't explain anything. Think I got screwed.

Reviews.Title: FALSE ADVERTISING!
Reviews.Author: MARTIN C. BACKER
Reviews.Content: FALSE ADVERTISING, PHONE WILL NOT WORK WITH VERIZON CELL PHONE NETWORK BUT ADVERTISING READ THIS PHONE WOULD WORK! BAD ADVERTISING, NOT HONEST!

ProductInfo.Name: RCA T1 Unlocked Dual SIM Phone with QWERTY Keyboard, Bluetooth, GPRS, Camera, FM, MP3, MP4 for AT&T and T-Mobile No Contract
